item.description:
The Windsor Chamber of Commerce annual "Chili Challenge" is happening on the Town Green.  More than 30 local businesses, civic groups, and creative cooks will be there with some of the best chili you have ever tasted.  Chili sample tickets are $1 each.

The annual Lions Arts and Crafts show is happening the same day.  The Green will be filled with Arts and Crafts booths of all types for the entire day.

There will be other food and beverage offered for sale, in addition to the chili contest.

Let's meet at noon on the north end of the green, across from CVS.

Note that the Windsor Kiwanis Club is also sponsoring a food and fund drive to benefit the Windsor Food and Fuel Banks, if you would like to contribute.
item.name: Chili Challenge and Arts and Crafts Show
